title: Tartiflette – French Potato, Bacon, and Illegal Cheese Casserole
directions: - 375F. for 45 minutes, or until potatoes are very tender
ingredients: 3 pounds russet potatoes, cooked with skins on, in salted water
12 ounces thick-cut bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
salt, freshly ground black pepper, and cayenne to taste
1 pound Reblochon cheese, or something similar like Dancing Fern
